name: Merino Consulting Services
description: Merino Consulting Services operates globally across 44 countries, standing as a leading IT consulting and enterprise software provider. Our dedication lies in offering top-tier, straightforward, and cutting-edge enterprise solutions, making us a preferred choice for organizations spanning diverse sectors. At Merino, we excel in delivering advanced tech solutions, aiding businesses of all magnitudes in their digital transformation endeavours. Our proven service delivery and implementation strategies consistently yield optimal outcomes. Prioritizing client needs, we've earned our reputation as a trusted tech partner for renowned brands. "Expect Beyond" isn't just our slogan—it's our ethos. We forge enduring client relationships by delivering unparalleled services and becoming integral allies to their ventures. Our round-the-clock availability emphasizes our commitment to outstanding service, distinguishing us from the rest.
features: romp Response and ready to help
At Merino, we believe in People over Procedures. Our managers achieve performance through better employee engagement
Headline:

 cannot stop us.

ShortDescription: Merino Consulting Services operates globally across 44 countries, standing as a leading IT consulting and enterprise software provider. Our dedication lies in offering top-tier, straightforward, and cutting-edge enterprise solutions, making us a preferred choice for organizations spanning diverse sectors.

Highlights.name: Award-Winning IT Consulting Services
Highlights.description: Merino Consulting Services recently won prestigious awards from Infor at Infor Velocity Tour, Mumbai 2024 [1]. This suggests that Merino Consulting Services is a well-respected company that provides high-quality IT consulting services.

Highlights.name: Expertise in Implementation, Migration, and Application Management
Highlights.description: Merino Consulting Services offers a variety of services including implementation, migration, and application management [1]. This means that they can help businesses with all aspects of their IT infrastructure, from setting up new systems to migrating to the cloud to managing ongoing operations.

Highlights.name: Global Presence
Highlights.description: Merino Consulting Services has expanded to Bilbao, Spain [1]. This suggests that they are a global company that can help businesses with their IT needs anywhere in the world.

enhanced_description: Merino Consulting Services is a leading global IT consulting and enterprise software provider operating in 44 countries. They specialize in offering top-tier, cutting-edge enterprise solutions and aiding businesses of all magnitudes in their digital transformation endeavors. Their core expertise includes implementation, migration, and application management for IT infrastructure, supporting clients in setting up new systems, migrating to the cloud, and managing ongoing operations. Merino leverages advanced technologies such as Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, and Blockchain. Renowned for their customer-centric approach, prompt responsiveness, and 24/7 availability, they prioritize client needs and have earned a reputation as a trusted tech partner for renowned brands. Their ethos, 'Expect Beyond,' is rooted in a 'People over Procedures' philosophy, focusing on achieving performance through better employee engagement, which also aligns with their objective to improve employee happiness and engagement. They have received awards for their high-quality IT consulting services.
key_use_cases: Ongoing application management and IT operations support
Improving employee happiness and engagement through IT strategies and organizational philosophy
competitive_advantages: Expertise in implementation, migration, and application management
Customer-centric approach with prompt response and 24/7 availability
Focus on 'People over Procedures' and employee engagement for performance

implementation_scenarios: Data and system migration projects (including cloud migration)
hr_functions_supported: Employee Benefits (as a strategic consideration for IT solutions)
